va-survivor-pension-child-disabled.title: Survivor Pension for Child with Disabilities
va-survivor-pension-child-disabled.headl: Survivor Pension for Child with Disabilities
va-survivor-pension-child-disabled.summa: Monthly payments may be available to qualified surviving dependent children of wartime veterans who meet certain income and net worth limits.
va-survivor-pension-child-disabled.eligi: The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
You are at least 18 years old.
